verses.verse: My breath <WH7307> is corrupt, <WH2254> my days <WH3117> are extinct, <WH2193> the graves <WH6913> are ready for me.
Are there not <WH3808> mockers <WH2049> with <WH5978> me? and doth not mine eye <WH5869> continue <WH3885> in their provocation? <WH4784>
Lay down <WH7760> now, <WH4994> put me in a surety <WH6148> with <WH5973> thee; who <WH4310> is he <WH1931> that will strike <WH8628> hands <WH3027> with me?
For <WH3588> thou hast hid <WH6845> their heart <WH3820> from understanding: <WH4480> <WH7922> therefore <WH3651> <WH5921> shalt thou not <WH3808> exalt <WH7311> them.
He that speaketh <WH5046> flattery <WH2506> to his friends, <WH7453> even the eyes <WH5869> of his children <WH1121> shall fail. <WH3615>
He hath made <WH3322> me also a byword <WH4914> of the people; <WH5971> and formerly <WH6440> I was <WH1961> as a tabret. <WH8611>
Mine eye <WH5869> also is dim <WH3543> by reason of sorrow, <WH4480> <WH3708> and all <WH3605> my members <WH3338> are as a shadow. <WH6738>
Upright <WH3477> men shall be astonished <WH8074> at <WH5921> this, <WH2063> and the innocent <WH5355> shall stir up himself <WH5782> against <WH5921> the hypocrite. <WH2611>
The righteous <WH6662> also shall hold <WH270> on his way, <WH1870> and he that hath clean <WH2889> hands <WH3027> shall be stronger and stronger. <WH3254> <WH555>
But <WH199> as for you all, <WH3605> do ye return, <WH7725> and come <WH935> now: <WH4994> for I cannot <WH3808> find <WH4672> one wise <WH2450> man among you.
My days <WH3117> are past, <WH5674> my purposes <WH2154> are broken off, <WH5423> even the thoughts <WH4180> of my heart. <WH3824>
They change <WH7760> the night <WH3915> into day: <WH3117> the light <WH216> is short <WH7138> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of darkness. <WH2822>
If <WH518> I wait, <WH6960> the grave <WH7585> is mine house: <WH1004> I have made <WH7502> my bed <WH3326> in the darkness. <WH2822>
I have said <WH7121> to corruption, <WH7845> Thou <WH859> art my father: <WH1> to the worm, <WH7415> Thou art my mother, <WH517> and my sister. <WH269>
And where <WH346> is now <WH645> my hope? <WH8615> as for my hope, <WH8615> who <WH4310> shall see <WH7789> it?
They shall go down <WH3381> to the bars <WH905> of the pit, <WH7585> when <WH518> our rest <WH5183> together <WH3162> is in <WH5921> the dust. <WH6083>
